vote.title: To honor Ezekiel Peebles III for his many years of service as a mental health advocate, and recognize the 10th anniversary of Key Counseling and Consultation.
vote.description:
Title
 
To honor Ezekiel Peebles III for his many years of service as a mental health advocate, and recognize the 10th anniversary of Key Counseling and Consultation.
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, For more than ten years, Ezekiel Peebles III has provided exceptional service to Columbus residents through his practice Key Counseling and Consultation; and
 
WHEREAS, February 2021 marks the 10th year anniversary of Key Counseling and Consultation; and
 
WHEREAS, Ezekiel received his bachelor’s degree in Criminology from The Ohio State University, and a master’s degree in Clinical Counseling from the University of Dayton; and
 
WHEREAS, Ezekiel has over 15 years of experience working in the mental health field assisting individuals, couples, families and groups in counseling and workshops; and
 
WHEREAS, As a mental health advocate and Counselor, he impacts the lives of hundreds of Columbus residents through a personalized approach to mental health; and
 
WHEREAS, Today, Ezekiel is pursuing a doctoral degree in the Educational Studies Counselor Education Program at The Ohio State University; and
 
WHEREAS, in addition to his remarkable service to the Columbus community, Ezekiel is a member of the American Counseling Association, Ohio Counseling Association, Alpha Phi Alpha Fraternity Inc., and is a member of New Salem Missionary Baptist Church; now, therefore
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS:
 
That we hereby honor and recognize Ezekiel Peebles III for his exceptional service in the mental health field and recognize the 10th anniversary of Key Counseling and Consultation.
